rows.label: tlk41100126_02_msg0001
rows.name:
You're a skilled Driver, so
are you also a shop owner?

rows.label: tlk41100126_02_msg0002
rows.name:
You must be raking in the
rewards, so you're probably a
regular patron at the shops.

rows.label: tlk41100126_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Being an owner always
comes with perks, right?

rows.label: tlk41100126_02_msg0004
rows.name:
I hear you can mysteriously
move faster, or mysteriously
gain more experience.
